BR_text.BRsummary: 'yarn start ' and 'npm start'  failing while loading web UI
BR_text.BRdescription:
'yarn start' is giving errors while trying to run the web UI  in localhost.Trying to run BentoML Web UI.Followed the section 'How to run and develop BentoML Web UI from '<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/blob/master/DEVELOPMENT.md>https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/blob/master/DEVELOPMENT.md</denchmark-link>
  to load the UI.
 After running the yarn and npm run build commands as directed its throwing errors and UI is not getting loaded after 'npm start' and 'yarn start'
 To Reproduce
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
 
 Go to Go to 'https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/blob/master/DEVELOPMENT.md'
 Scroll down to 'How to run and develop BentoML Web UI'.'
 See error after 'yarn install' and 'yarn start' command.
 yarn run v1.22.4
 $ node dist/index.js
 internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:716
 throw err;
 ^
 
 Error: Cannot find module '/home/techmadmin/Documents/BentoML/bentoml/yatai/web/dist/index.js'
 at Function.Module._resolveFilename (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:713:15)
 at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:618:27)
 at Function.Module.runMain (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:931:10)
 at internal/main/run_main_module.js:17:11 {
 code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND',
 requireStack: []
 }
 error Command failed with exit code 1.
 info Visit <denchmark-link:https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run>https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run</denchmark-link>
  for documentation about this command.
 Expected behavior
 WebUI served on Localhost
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10370721/87624209-c846ad00-c744-11ea-8971-099c94e603e7.png></denchmark-link>
 
 Environment:
 OS: Ubuntu 18.04
 Python/BentoML Version [ Python 3.7.1, BentoML-0.8.2]
 Node version -v12.8.0
 -Yarn Version - 1.22.

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/athulprathap>@athulprathap</denchmark-link>
  I encounter a similar error when I didn't run  after I ran the command . Did you have a successful build?

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/yubozhao>@yubozhao</denchmark-link>
  Yes 'npm run build' is successful and 'yarn build' was executed before 'yarn start'.
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10370721/87647485-035cd680-c76d-11ea-8b05-4f38f7900de4.png></denchmark-link>

comments_2.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/athulprathap>@athulprathap</denchmark-link>
  The start script is incorrectly pointing at the wrong file.  I updated it at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/pull/906>#906</denchmark-link>
 .
